task.title: Verifying the installation on Linux
task.shortdesc: How to verify the installation in the Linux operating environment.

prolog.author: Jen Linton
JoAnn Hackos
Kylene Bruski
Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

step.cmd: Type ant all and press Enter to begin to process the DITA files in the demo, doc, docbook, and samples directories. This procedure also verifies the Toolkit installation.
step.stepresult: The testing process completes in 3-10 minutes depending on the speed of your machine. When testing completes, the confirmation message "BUILD SUCCESSFUL" displays.

taskbody.result: Be sure the directories and files in your ditaot are as described in Directories and files in the ditaot root directory.
